text: Agostino Monorchio is an electrical engineer at the University of Pisa, Italy. He was named a Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2012 for his contributions to computational electromagnetics and for his work on frequency selective surfaces in metamaterials. == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Italian engineers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Agostino Monorchio
